faq.question: What are your business hours?
faq.answer: Our support team is available Monday through Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM AEST (Australian Eastern Standard Time). Our AI chatbots provide 24/7 automated assistance, and you can always reach us via email at support@marvi.ai for urgent matters outside business hours.

faq.question: How do I get started with Marvi.ai?
faq.answer: Schedule a consultation with us for setup and training. We'll assess your needs and create a tailored implementation plan.

faq.question: Can Marvi.ai integrate with my existing systems?
faq.answer: Yes, Marvi.ai is compatible with CRM, ERP, and various business systems. Our solutions are designed for seamless integration.

faq.question: How does Marvi.ai ensure data security?
faq.answer: We guarantee GDPR-compliant encryption and maintain strict security protocols to protect your data.

faq.question: What kind of support does Marvi.ai offer?
faq.answer: We provide comprehensive support including full implementation, staff training, and ongoing maintenance.

faq.question: Can Marvi.ai's solutions be customised?
faq.answer: Yes, our solutions are fully customisable and tailored to meet your specific business needs and requirements.

faq.question: What are your pricing plans?
faq.answer: For detailed information about our pricing plans and packages, please contact our sales team at sales@marvi.ai. We offer customized solutions tailored to your business needs and scale.
